name: Tinja
description:
"Tinja" is a logical puzzle game in which the player moves the stones through the maze, in order to put them on the given end positions. Only one stone can be moved at a time, and the ball, which is controlled by the player, can only push the stones away from him, but do not pull them with him.
The stones placed on the desired positions light up in red. When all of them will be in the right place, the portal sending to the next level will be active.

Main features of the game:
  • The game has a well-developed balance, you will encounter light levels at the beginning of the game and more difficult to the middle and the end. It is possible to go further, if you are faced with a level that is too difficult for you.
  • The game has more than 50 levels! They will give you many hours of exciting game.
  • Nice graphics in the style of pixel art
